ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor shall have each pipe checked for level as it is laid, by a competent technician using an approved Principals Representatives’ level, laser instrument or other approved equipment.  Pipes shall be laid on uniform gradients between successive designated bends within the specified tolerances.

• Only sound pipes shall be laid and all pipes shall be checked immediately before placing in the trench
